sentences.en: a sale of miscellaneous household items
Dan be divided into pure malt scotch and miscellaneous two kinds.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰威士忌可分为纯麦芽以及渗杂两种.

sentences.en: Housework is usually miscellaneous and toilsome.
sentences.cn: 家务劳动通常是繁杂的.

sentences.en: In the bar - room he found assembled quite a miscellaneous company.
sentences.cn: 他走进酒吧间,看见里面聚着九流三教的人物.

sentences.en: Plant public address , Access door controller, and other miscellaneous electrical equipment maintenance.
sentences.cn: 工厂广播系统, 门禁系统和其他零星电气设备的维护保养.

sentences.en: Production: Mahjong tiles, and miscellaneous pieces of hardware, plastic products.
sentences.cn: 生产: 麻将牌 、 五金杂件 、 塑料制品.

sentences.en: The door has a notice that miscellaneous people may not enter.
sentences.cn: 门上的告示写着:“闲杂人等,不得擅入”.

sentences.en: The narrative image of The Miscellaneous Color is worth researching.
sentences.cn: 《杂色》的叙事意象是值得研究的.

sentences.en: The report was buried under miscellaneous papers.
sentences.cn: 那份报告被各种各样的文件所覆盖.

sentences.en: The six food groups include grain products, vegetables, fruits, milk and milk products, meats and meat alternates, and a miscellaneous group.
sentences.cn: 这6类食物包括谷类产品、蔬菜、水果、牛奶和奶制品、肉类和肉类替代品以及杂类食品。

sentences.en: The solution file does not permanently manage a list of miscellaneous files.
sentences.cn: 解决方案文件不永久管理杂项文件列表.

sentences.en: There are miscellaneous tools, pliers , putty knife, polarity stamps, battery stamping or coding equipment, lead cutters.
sentences.cn: 有各种工具 、 手钳 、 油灰刀, 极性印戮 、 电他标记打印或编号机 、 铅切刀.

sentences.en: They eat a lot of meats and dairy foods, along with a lot of miscellaneous items that don't fall into any group.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了大量的肉和奶制品，还有许多不知道该归为什么类别的杂七杂八的东西。

sentences.en: They receive a grant of £1,094 to cover the cost of miscellaneous expenses.
sentences.cn: 他们获得1,094英镑的津贴用于支付各种开支。

sentences.en: Why don't you just put that in the miscellaneous file for now?
sentences.cn: 你暂时就把它们归在杂物档里吧好 吗 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 杂项工具，其他气动工具

trans.tran_cn: 各种各样的，五花八门的，混杂的，多方面的
trans.tran_en: a miscellaneous set of things or people includes many different things or people that do not seem to be connected with each other
